entry.summary: An optimization tool from the Department of Air Forceâ€“MIT AI Accelerator is transforming the laborious process of staffing C-17 cargo flights.

entry.title: Giving robots better moves
entry.summary: MIT alumnus-founded RightHand Robotics has developed picking robots that are more reliable and adaptable in warehouse environments.

entry.title: Intelligent carpet gives insight into human poses
entry.summary: Tactical sensing carpet estimates 3D human poses without the use of cameras, and could improve health monitoring and smart homes.

entry.title: v1.11.0
entry.summary:
Added: support an experimental template for YouTube feed ðŸ“º Demo | Source
Aggregate content from any YouTube channel rss url https://www.youtube.com/feeds/videos.xml?channel_id=<replace_with_channel_id> Videos are embedded via iframe and loading accelerated by youtube-lite-embed Ads are reduced thanks to YouTube's policy for embedded videos ðŸ™ƒ Works on mobile devices with butter smooth horizontal scroll. Caveat: the template works only with YouTube content. You cannot mix textual RSS feed or other video sources such as Vimeo. Changed: Default HTML template meta tag adjusted to match convention Changed: sources in template data is now ordered by last update timestamp (as opposed to alphabetical) Thank you @PiyushLosalka

entry.title: Developing drones to address pandemic-related challenges in Scandinavia
entry.summary: After meeting in an Advanced Study Program at MIT, three Norwegian students began working together to transport biological samples using autonomous vehicles.

entry.title: A unique collaboration with US Special Operations Command
